scripts.build: tsc && npm run prepend-shebang-check-zip && npm run prepend-shebang-check-filesize
scripts.prepend-shebang-check-zip: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/check-zip.js > dist/check-zip.js.new && mv dist/check-zip.js.new dist/check-zip.js
scripts.prepend-shebang-check-filesize: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/check-filesize.js > dist/check-filesize.js.new && mv dist/check-filesize.js.new dist/check-filesize.js
